comments:
New > Project > General > Project
Deselect "Default Location", choose Filesystem: "RSE", 
Select a remote linux dstore server, navigate to "My Home", cdt-remote-rsefs
Project is created, switch to the Resource Perspective
Choose New > Untitled Text File
Enter something
Choose Save, enter "test.txt"
In PDE Error Log, observe following exception:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Attempted to beginRule: F/RemoteSystemsTempFiles/PARSER/folk/mober, does not match outer scope rule: P/cdt-remote-rsefs
